ca1a1af8-1d1b-4eef-892b-8d92b0a89d41.Text: For the next attack against a target affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and block will be reduced by −<u>(15 + ({unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} / 3) × stacks of exploit)</u>%. This attack will have +<u>(15 + ({unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} / 3) × stacks of exploit)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. It will also do 1.5x damage.

d9fe0ee9-f347-417a-9bdc-380fb74c9318.Text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +2 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.

a6b9621a-5d74-43d9-9b6e-5d3402b6550b.Text:
The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(25 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.
